title: Nuba Girl of Kordofan, Africa
marks: Signature, Date, Title and Inscription on verso, top , in pencil: [38-17-9. / NUBA Girl O
description: portrait bust of black girl; scars on chest; small rings cover proper right ear lobe; one larger ring at bottom; white rod below lip; decorative nose ring and round disk; bead necklace around neck has two strands of small beads
